#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
bool prime[10000]{ 1,1 };
void sieve() {
	for (int i = 2; i * i <= 10000; i++)
		if (!prime[i]) {
			for (int j = i * i; j <= 10000; j += i) prime[j] = 1;
		}
}
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(0);
	sieve();
	int t, l, u, a;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--)
	{
		a = 0;
		cin >> l >> u;
		for (; l <= u; l++)
		{
			int tmp = l, s = 0;
			while (tmp)
			{
				s += tmp % 10;
				tmp /= 10;
			}
			a += !prime[s];
		}
		cout << a << "\n";
	}
}
